targets.query: SELECT "temperature" AS "temperature", "humidity" AS "humidity" FROM "iot-rp"."mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("device_friendlyName" = 'bathroom.temp') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device_friendlyName"

list.name: TempSensors
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM mqtt_consumer WITH KEY=device_friendlyName WHERE "device_friendlyName" =~ /.temp/

list.name: LumiSensors
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM mqtt_consumer WITH KEY=device_friendlyName WHERE "device_friendlyName" =~ /.lumi/ OR  "device_friendlyName" =~ /.presence/
